title: runtime: gdb next at function entry point makes "misuse of rewindmorestack" crash in runtime.newstack on freebsd/amd64
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. compile attached
2. start gdb with test.go, set breakpoint at main.main, then run
3. type next, step and next 

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
no crash, if possible

Please use labels and text to provide additional information.
% go version
go version devel +f974949adf23 Thu Aug 29 17:15:35 2013 +1000 freebsd/amd64
% gdb76 version
GNU gdb (GDB) 7.6 [GDB v7.6 for FreeBSD]
Attachments: 1. test.go (70 bytes) 1. gdbsess.txt (969 bytes)
